channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shares of Uniqlo’s parent company drop almost 5% as the retailer warns of a ‘turning point’ in its China strategy
item.description: Fast Retailing, the Japanese owner of Uniqlo, is warning of large drops in profit and revenue from China, even as sales in other markets grow.

item.title: Elon Musk's X deceives users and breaches online content rules, EU says
item.description: Elon Musk's X is in breach of EU online content rules as the social media platform uses "dark patterns" to deceive users, the European Commission said Friday.

item.title: Tesla gets downgrade to sell at UBS on concerns growth businesses overvalued
Delta CEO says the Olympics is turning tourists off Paris—and it’s costing the airline $100 million
item.description: The Atlanta-based carrier has especially felt tourist’s aversion to the major sporting event because it services more American travel to France than any other US airline.

item.title: Friday's analyst calls: Tesla downgraded to sell, JPMorgan likes Netflix into earnings
item.description: With the earnings season about to kick into higher gear, analysts are taking hard looks at their models and adjusting ratings. UBS cuts Tesla to sell.

item.title: Dollar General to pay $12 million fine and take steps to make its stores safer
‘Bond King’ Bill Gross says Tesla is the new meme stock with ‘sagging fundamentals’
item.description: Bill Gross said on X: "There seems to be a new meme stock every other day now. Most are pump and dump."

item.title: U.S., Germany foil alleged Russian plot to assassinate CEO of German arms firm
item.description: The alleged plot targeted the CEO of Rheinmetall, which provides artillery rounds to Ukraine and plans to open plants in Ukraine to make armored vehicles.

item.title: Biden refers to Harris as ‘Vice President Trump’ as he touts economy’s strength
Angry birds are attacking drones employed to patrol NYC beaches for sharks and struggling swimmers
item.description: The attacks are fueling concern from wildlife experts about the impact on threatened species nesting along the coast.

item.title: Europe markets reach 1-month high; Ericsson up 4%
item.description: European stocks were higher Friday, defying a broader global selloff, with fresh inflation data set to land.

item.title: Fed’s Goolsbee: ‘Profoundly encouraging’ June CPI data makes case for rate cuts
Love Island stars prove they’re all about the content and not the crime as they plead guilty to FX allegations
item.description: Rebecca Gormley, Biggs Chris, Jamie Clayton, Lauren Goodger, Yazmin Oukhellou and Scott Timlin have all been charged.

item.title: Ericsson shares jump 6% as sales fall less than expected, North America returns to growth
item.description: Ericsson reported a smaller-than-expected 7% drop in second-quarter sales as sluggish demand for 5G gear was slightly offset by growth in North America.

item.title: Traders piled into bets against small-cap stocks at exactly the wrong time
